name: RES_RPT_CMP_PL_VER
description: This table displays the instants that the components in the equation (of the repeat component) were verified.

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the result record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the associated repeat result component in the result record. Together with RESULT_ID, this forms the foreign key to the RES_REPEAT_COMP table.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple instants of verification of the repeat component used in equations for a repeat result from the RES_REPEAT_COMP table.

columns.name: RPT_PULL_RES_VER_TM
columns.description: These are the instants that the components in the equation were verified.
